DOC.brief_summary: Observing the effects of an Olympus cap on the visibility and in adenoma detection during colonoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Will Cap-Assisted Colonoscopy Improve Performance of Colonoscopy: A Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: To see if Colonoscopy with the CAP is able to give more visibility and to see if detection rate for adenomas, polyps are easier to detect.
DOC.criteria: Patients already booked for a colonoscopy History of Colorectal Cancer Severe colitis Cancer poor bowel prep
